definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: The master bedroom of Room 318 had changed little since his stay 17 years earlier.
sentences.chinese: 318房的主卧室和他十七年前入住时相比变化不大。

sentences.english: They counterchanged the floor in the bedroom with several colours.
sentences.chinese: 他们把卧室的地板铺成交错的颜色。
我有一间漂亮的卧室缷。

sentences.english: The water has penetrated into the bedroom, so there must be a hole in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 水已经进入卧室，所以肯定在房顶上有洞。

sentences.english: You may want to change the furniture placement in your living room or paint the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你也许会想更换客厅里家具的位置或者卧室里的挂画。

sentences.english: Another's bedroom is tilting.There are cracks on many of the walls.
sentences.chinese: 另一间卧室也已倾斜，墙壁上尽是裂隙。

sentences.english: The Mu comes out from Ye in the bedroom, (…) , ruthlessly hold ascend.
sentences.chinese: 姆从卧室里拽出来，狠狠地捧上一顿。

sentences.english: A portiere at the farther side showed the entrance to the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 远处那边的一个门帷露出了通往卧室的进口。

sentences.english: No one had ever heard of anyone using Propofol in a bedroom EVER until CM.
sentences.chinese: 没有人曾经听说过有人异丙酚在卧室里曾经直到厘米。

sentences.english: Technically it's a 5-bedroom house plus an office.
sentences.chinese: 技术上，它是5家卧室加一个办事处。

sentences.english: Each bedroom in the hotel has a bathroom en suite.
sentences.chinese: 该旅馆每间卧室都有一洗澡间自成一套。

sentences.english: If it is in the bedroom, make sure you can make the lights softer and dimmer.
sentences.chinese: 如果是在卧室，确保灯光柔和以及可以忽明忽暗。

sentences.english: Jessica’s Daddy went back into his bedroom and into his closet.
sentences.chinese: 杰西卡的爸爸回到他的卧室，然后走进他的衣帽间。

sentences.english: I am frightened, and hurriedly fled the bedroom of my sister Barbara's .
sentences.chinese: 我吓坏了，赶紧逃向了我妹妹芭芭拉的卧室中。

sentences.english: We're making our attic into an extra bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在把阁楼改装成一间额外的卧室。

sentences.english: Introduce your bedroom to your classmates or friends.
sentences.chinese: 向同学，朋友介绍你的卧室。

definition: drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
